headline: How Investors May Respond To Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Surging da Vinci Usage and New FDA Approvals
summary: In recent days, Intuitive Surgical reported strong demand for its da Vinci robotic systems, with procedure volumes rising faster than system installations and new FDA approvals expanding the range of eligible surgical procedures. This combination of high utilization and added clinical indications reinforces the company’s platform-based model, where each installed robot can generate increasing recurring revenue from instruments and services over time. Next, we’ll examine how accelerating da...

headline: Marshall Mohr Joins Capstan Medical Board of Directors
summary: Capstan Medical, a developer of robotic-enabled, minimally invasive solutions to address heart valve disease, today announced the appointment of Marshall Mohr to its Board of Directors to further advance the company's mission of bringing its innovative structural heart solution to market and making treatment more accessible to patients.

headline: ISRG Trading 4% Below All-Time High: Should You Buy the Stock Now?
summary: ISRG trades just 4% below its record high after a 32% surge over the past three months, driven by strong procedure growth, rising utilization, and early traction for the da Vinci 5 system.

headline: Dow Jones Futures Rise After S&P 500 Hits High; Amazon Leads New Buys
summary: The S&P 500 hit a new high Tuesday while Amazon led several stocks flashing buy signals. Tesla fell back below key support.

headline: Taking A Fresh Look At Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Valuation After A Strong Recent Share Price Run
summary: With no fresh headline catalyst, Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) is drawing attention for its recent share performance as investors weigh the company’s current valuation in relation to its role in minimally invasive surgical systems and services. See our latest analysis for Intuitive Surgical. Recent trading has been positive, with a 1-day share price return of 4.67% to US$592.85 and a 90-day share price return of 32.31%. The 5-year total shareholder return of 125.58% points to strong longer term...
